greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of rooted trees with n nodes such that k equals the maximal number of isomorphic subtrees extending from the same node; triangle T(n,k), n>=1, 0<=k<=n-1, read by rows.
comment: T(n,k) is defined for n,k >= 0.  The triangle contains only the terms with k < n.  T(n,k) = 0 for k >= n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..200, flattened
maple: h:= proc(n, m, t, k) option remember; `if`(m=0, binomial(n+t, t),
b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,
mathematica: h[n_, m_, t_, k_] := h[n, m, t, k] = If[m == 0, Binomial[n + t, t], If[n == 0, 0, Sum[h[n - 1, m - j, t + 1, k], {j, 1, Min[k, m]}]]];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 1, 14}, {k, 0, n - 1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 11 2019, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 02 2018
